name: retaliation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of hurting someone or doing something harmful to someone because they have done or said something harmful to you: The bomb attack was in retaliation for the recent arrest of two well-known terrorists. She suffered severe retaliation for writing articles for the newspapers. See
retaliate
More examplesFewer examplesThe government fears retaliation after the attacks.They are angry about a loss of manufacturing jobs and have threatened retaliation.He offered to protect victims from retaliation following complaints.
